name: guardian-naga-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of guardian-naga-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of guardian-naga-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Imagine a heroic, tabletop fantasy setting, mirroring the grounded medieval-fantasy materials of Dungeons and Dragons 5e. The scene shows a muscular, many-limbed guardian naga, wreathed in bioluminescent accents, gliding gracefully through a merged zone of sky and sea. The naga wears culturally coherent gear, devoid of any modern technology. Its presence is enlarged by a human silhouette nearby for comparison. The style is painterly, consistent, and filled with the motion of aquatic fantasy realism, lit with the glow of subsurface caustics. The dominant colors are teals, deep blues, and sea-greens, punctuated with pearl highlights. A pressure-dome constructed with medieval technology provides mystery in the scene. There are no artifacts, modern signs, garbled strings, sci-fi UIs, photoreal CGI, anime style elements, or blooms of glare. It's a detailed piece of concept art representing a rich, unique fantasy world.
